(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB When))
    (SQ (VBP do)
      (NP (PRP you))
      (ADVP (DT all))
      (VP (VB send)
        (NP (NNS postcards))))
    (. ?)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB only))
    (VP
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB ever))
        (VB buy)
        (NP (NNS postcards))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB when))
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP am)
              (ADVP (RB overseas))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB send)
        (NP (PRP them))
        (ADVP (RB back)
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS friends)
              (CC and)
              (NNS relatives))))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (NNP Singapore)))))
    (. .)))

  (S (CC And)
    (SBAR (RB just) (IN in) (NN case)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP are)
          (VP (VBG wondering)
            (SBAR
              (WHADVP (WRB why))
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP (MD should)
                  (VP (VB do)
                    (NP (DT all))))))))))
    (NP (DT the) (NN work)
      (CC and)
      (NN someone))
    (ADVP (RB else))
    (VP (VBZ gets)
      (NP
        (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NNS goodies))
        (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
          (S
            (VP (VB yeah)
              (SBAR
                (S
                  (NP (PRP I))
                  (VP (VBD thought)
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (DT that)))
                    (ADVP (RB too)))))))
          (-RRB- -RRB-))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB do)
      (NP (RB n't))
      (NP (NN worry))
      (, ,))))


root(ROOT-0, do-1)
iobj(do-1, n't-2)
dobj(do-1, worry-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (ADVP (RB also))
    (VP (VBP stand)
      (S
        (NP (DT the) (NN chance))
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB win)
            (NP
              (NP (JJ free) (NN hotel) (NN stay))
              (CC and)
              (NP (NNS freebies)))
            (PP (IN like)
              (NP (NN spa) (NNS treatments)
                (CC and)
                (NN shopping) (NNS vouchers)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(stand-3, you-1)
advmod(stand-3, also-2)
root(ROOT-0, stand-3)
det(chance-5, the-4)
nsubj(win-7, chance-5)
aux(win-7, to-6)
xcomp(stand-3, win-7)
amod(stay-10, free-8)
nn(stay-10, hotel-9)
dobj(win-7, stay-10)
cc(stay-10, and-11)
conj(stay-10, freebies-12)
prep(win-7, like-13)
nn(treatments-15, spa-14)
pobj(like-13, treatments-15)
cc(treatments-15, and-16)
nn(vouchers-18, shopping-17)
conj(treatments-15, vouchers-18)


(ROOT
  (S (RB So)
    (VP (VB send)
      (NP (DT an) (JJ ePostcard) (NN today)))
    (. !)))


advmod(send-2, So-1)
root(ROOT-0, send-2)
det(today-5, an-3)
amod(today-5, ePostcard-4)
tmod(send-2, today-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ great) (NN way)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB catch)
              (PRT (RP up))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS friends))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(way-5, It-1)
cop(way-5, 's-2)
det(way-5, a-3)
amod(way-5, great-4)
root(ROOT-0, way-5)
aux(catch-7, to-6)
infmod(way-5, catch-7)
prt(catch-7, up-8)
prep(catch-7, with-9)
poss(friends-11, your-10)
pobj(with-9, friends-11)


(ROOT
  (X
    (S
      (VP (VB win)
        (NP (DT some) (NNS prizes))))
    (CC and)
    (PP (IN at)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN time)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB do)
              (NP (PRP$ your) (NN part)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB sell)
                      (NP (NNP Singapore))
                      (PP (TO to)
                        (NP (DT the) (NN world)))))))))))
      (. !))))


root(ROOT-0, win-1)
det(prizes-3, some-2)
dobj(win-1, prizes-3)
cc(win-1, and-4)
dep(win-1, at-5)
det(time-8, the-6)
amod(time-8, same-7)
pobj(at-5, time-8)
aux(do-10, to-9)
infmod(time-8, do-10)
poss(part-12, your-11)
dobj(do-10, part-12)
aux(sell-14, to-13)
infmod(part-12, sell-14)
dobj(sell-14, Singapore-15)
prep(sell-14, to-16)
det(world-18, the-17)
pobj(to-16, world-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Click)
      (ADVP (RB HERE))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB start)
            (S
              (VP (VBG sending)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS ePostcards))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Click-1)
advmod(Click-1, HERE-2)
aux(start-4, to-3)
xcomp(Click-1, start-4)
xcomp(start-4, sending-5)
poss(ePostcards-7, your-6)
dobj(sending-5, ePostcards-7)
